meanings.definition: A person who has elevated blood sugar levels but does not yet have diabetes.
meanings.sent1: Many prediabetics can prevent diabetes through lifestyle changes.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised the prediabetics to monitor their blood sugar regularly.
meanings.sent3: The prediabetics formed a support group to share healthy recipes and exercise tips.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of sugary temptations, the prediabetics stood strong like beacons of health.
meanings.sent5: The prediabetics learned to control their sugar intake to avoid developing diabetes.

meanings.definition: Relating to the stage before the development of diabetes.
meanings.sent1: Regular exercise is important for prediabetics to maintain their health.
meanings.sent2: The prediabetics clinic offers specialized care for individuals at risk of diabetes.
meanings.sent3: The prediabetics-friendly menu at the restaurant featured low-sugar options.
meanings.sent4: The prediabetics' journey towards better health was marked by small victories.
meanings.sent5: The prediabetics embraced a proactive approach to prevent diabetes onset.
